# About the Authors {-}

The authors have decades of combined experience in data analysis for genomics. They are developers of Bioconductor packages such as **methylKit**, **genomation**, **RCAS** and **netSmooth**. In addition, they have played key roles in developing end-to-end genomics data analysis pipelines for RNA-seq, ChIP-seq, Bisulfite-seq, and single cell RNA-seq called PiGx.
